column5: Great report Rich, well except for the onions.  I just can't stomach those things.  For some reason they give me an instant gag reflex.
Great pix... I see you picked up some gold bands ... easier on your wallet eh.  Thanks for reporting.

Excellent report! Looks like your getaway was a success! Congrats on the topwater Musky. I have been eyeing the top raider for quite some time. Maybe I will pick one up one day!  I think all the ONIONS kept away the racoons.LOL  I've eaten at that Texas burger many times and the food is pretty good.
Nice report and fish Rich and Sleded! Glad to see you got some of everything you were targeting
Great report Rich. A few fish and good times as always.  Thanks  Mike
great report rich!
congrats on all those fish. you guys sure did eat well.
I have this nagging urge to find me some KAWARTHA DAIRY!!!  Great stuff guys
Yup, Rich has it right.  The food is the only reliable part of the trip, you might as well get that part just right.  Great photos and dialogue as always.
Great report Rich. I felt like I was right there with you, Sleded and the raccoons! -Brian
memories that'll last a lifetime dude....great report!
Looks like a blast Rich. Well done.
LOL..... you guys are mad  Burt
dude great report! got to love the KD!
You two sure are quite the characters.  As always, a colourful report, complete with pics.  Way to go  Joey

Ahhh, that was a splendid report!  Were you guys fishing Rice Lake, cuz that looks like you were fishing by Grape Island at one point?  And I must say, that pic of you Rich with the Onions is classic!  You guys are the ONION KINGS!  That has a nice ring if I do say so myself.  Nice job boys!

sounds like you guys sure know how to make the best of the mission for sure....now it's hot I want some ice cream  , they sell the K Dairy icecream at the avondale just down the road from me..but it's too late it's closed now...thanks guys  .   all you guys gettin all the skis are kinda giving me the big bug bad...haven't been able to go since they opened..dam work,closest I got was sorting out some of my musky lures.  Pretty amusing read and pics to go with them too.....oh I get it...if ya live off chicken weiners...more money for beer right
Wow, sounds like a great trip... not sure what else to say... you guys ROCK!
Wonderful report and pics, it's really nice to see a couple of young fellows getting out and having a weekend fishing trip like that.

Amazing report! A couple days of hardcore fishing and camping is the best! Congrats on a successful multi-specie trip.  Next time i get up there I'm gonna get myself some of that KD so i won't get skunked
Another great report boys, glad it's was all good..
Excellent report and pics guys. Looks like a great time.
great report rich looks like a great time
Looks like those hours paid off in musky.  Congrats, I've yet to get one on topwater, that must've been quite the experience.  Onions
I think I'm gonna have a vicarious heart attack!  Great report Musky Rich!
